name: RestoringRivers

”Alexa, open Restoring Rivers”
”Alexa, start Restoring Rivers”
”Alexa, launch Restoring Rivers”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: restoring rivers
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number." 
Play an interactive Infotainment on Art Therapy for Wilderness Therapy on the theme of restoring rivers. Restoring Rivers is the first episode of art therapy, as part of Wilderness Therapy of Vayu Vaidya, in this episode we present sample pieces of art, created by the author to demonstrate Freudian based art analysis of the creative sub-processes of surrealist automation, surfacing of the subconscious, in the use of art therapy in diagnosis, prognosis, and treatment, we present a summary of Freudian interpretations and infotainment on the naturalness of the therapy.
You can browse Vayu VAidya Infotainment at https://vayuvaidya.weebly.com
You can say "stop" anywhere in the skill to exit the skill at any time, saying "help" provides a help menu and "loop off" restarts the skill.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
